item.title: Clickupy - API + FUSE for Clickup
item.description: TL:DR pip install clickupy / https://github.com/dang3r/clickupy Over the past few years, I have used many different project management tools. JIRA has been a consistent one, and the tool with the most name recognition. Trello is a very lightweight alternative, and the the one I personally use. Redbooth is another big player and I’ve used it heavily (especially while working there!). Wrike and Asana are a few others I’ve encountered every now and then.
